critique: The executive order is a legal document that amends a previous order. It is unlikely that the president wants the audience to feel any particular emotion. The order is simply stating that the Commandant must be satisfied that the character and habits of life of any person employed on a merchant vessel of the United States are such as to authorize the belief that the presence of the individual on board would not be inimical to the security of the United States. Therefore, the initial scores for all emotions should be 1.
